TopicTitle: Launch rocket bugs into space on reload

Articles.Content:
Specs:

Intel I5-12600KF

15.85GB RAM

NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070

 

Low: Can just revert to launch

Frequency: Low, this is the first time this has happened but KSP2 did crash before this bug happened

I was launching a couple rockets to insert a bunch of satellites into an orbit around kerbol and bu the time there was six spacecraft including the last rocket escaping kerbin, the game crashed for some reason, probably a ton of spacecraft. Anyways, when I log back in a little bit later the rocket I was using to launch the sixth and final satellite has not been started but it is in space going 9258 m/s away from kerbin. I did restart my pc between the crash and the reload. Also when I go into the orbital view the rocket seems to be falling directly into kerbol
